```{r}
jour7 |>
  separate(col = value, into = c("col1", "col2"), sep = "\\:") |>
  mutate(col2 = str_replace_all(col2, "\\s+", " ")) |> 
  mutate(col2 = str_trim(col2)) -> jour7_1
```

```{r}
calcul <- function(vec, res) {
  expand.grid(rep(list(c("*","+")), length(vec)-1L)) |>
    as.matrix() |>
    asplit(MARGIN =1) |>
    map_dbl(\(x) left2right (x, vec, res))
}
```
